forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the night drapes over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle embrace of mostly cloudy skies lingers, underlined by a moderate breeze from the west southwest at 12 mph. The temperature, a comfortable 54 degrees, hints at an evening of reflection, where the warmth of a soft blanket might be as inviting as a good book. Yet, dawn brings promises of change; Friday boasts a transformation into mostly sunny skies, where the sun's golden hues will peek through by late morning, nudging temperatures to a delightful 66 before gracefully dipping back to 64 as the afternoon unfurls.

The picture painted by the day's shift suggests a brightened outlook, with wisps of fog likely lingering closer to the coast, just nudging at the city’s edges. Those venturing out should wear layers, perhaps a light sweater or a windbreaker to counter the briskness of that afternoon breeze, while still enjoying the warmth of the sun’s rays. As the morning unfolds, a stroll through a quiet park, a visit to a favorite café, or even a leisurely bike ride along the waterfront would be perfect ways to savor the crispness of the day, all to the backdrop of a vibrant and inviting city.
